text:
CB Insights | www.cbinsights.com | New York, NY

CB Insights is a National Science Foundation-funded tech firm assessing the health of private companies using public data. We're currently hiring for the following full-time positions:

Full Stack Developer: http://www.cbinsights.com/jobs/full-stack-developer Tech Business Reporter: http://www.cbinsights.com/jobs/tech-business-reporter Product Adoption Manager: http://www.cbinsights.com/jobs/product-adoption-manager

Our entire jobs page: http://www.cbinsights.com/jobs/
